user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion and I need some creative decoration ideas. Can you fetch the newly added products related to party decorations from the last 30 days and provide me with their names, descriptions, and prices? Additionally, I would like to see the comments and star ratings of the products to ensure their quality.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of newly added party decoration products from the last 30 days.
Retrieve the names, descriptions, and prices of the fetched party decoration products.
Collect comments and star ratings for the decoration products to assess quality.
